mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_ASSET_LOG t where t.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_ASSET_LOG ( ID, USERID, USERNAME, MOBILE, TRANTYPE, ITEMTYPE, ITEMNAME, FROMER, TOER, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, TRANTIME, TRANYEAR, TRANMONTH, IDNO, IDNAME ) VALUES( #{info.id:VARCHAR}, #{info.userid:VARCHAR}, #{info.username:VARCHAR}, #{info.mobile:VARCHAR}, #{info.tranType:NUMERIC}, #{info.itemType:VARCHAR}, #{info.itemName:VARCHAR}, #{info.fromer:VARCHAR}, #{info.toer:VARCHAR}, #{info.createtime:VARCHAR}, #{info.updatetime:VARCHAR}, #{info.tranTime:VARCHAR}, #{info.tranYear:VARCHAR}, #{info.tranMonth:VARCHAR}, #{info.idNo:VARCHAR}, #{info.idName:VARCHAR} )

( #{info.id:VARCHAR}, #{info.userid:VARCHAR}, #{info.username:VARCHAR}, #{info.mobile:VARCHAR}, #{info.tranType:NUMERIC}, #{info.itemType:VARCHAR}, #{info.itemName:VARCHAR}, #{info.fromer:VARCHAR}, #{info.toer:VARCHAR}, #{info.createtime:VARCHAR}, #{info.updatetime:VARCHAR}, #{info.tranTime:VARCHAR}, #{info.tranYear:VARCHAR}, #{info.tranMonth:VARCHAR}, #{info.idNo:VARCHAR}, #{info.idName:VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_ASSET_LOG SET USERID = #{info.userid:VARCHAR}, USERNAME = #{info.username:VARCHAR}, MOBILE = #{info.mobile:VARCHAR}, TRANTYPE = #{info.tranType:NUMERIC}, ITEMTYPE = #{info.itemType:VARCHAR}, ITEMNAME = #{info.itemName:VARCHAR}, FROMER = #{info.fromer:VARCHAR}, TOER = #{info.toer:VARCHAR}, UPDATETIME = #{info.updatetime:VARCHAR}, TRANTIME = #{info.tranTime:VARCHAR}, TRANYEAR = #{info.tranYear:VARCHAR}, TRANMONTH = #{info.tranMonth:VARCHAR}, IDNO = #{info.idNo:VARCHAR}, IDNAME = #{info.idName:VARCHAR} WHERE ID = #{info.id}

update.foreach: UPDATE TB_ASSET_LOG SET USERID = #{info.userid:VARCHAR}, USERNAME = #{info.username:VARCHAR}, MOBILE = #{info.mobile:VARCHAR}, TRANTYPE = #{info.tranType:NUMERIC}, ITEMTYPE = #{info.itemType:VARCHAR}, ITEMNAME = #{info.itemName:VARCHAR}, FROMER = #{info.fromer:VARCHAR}, TOER = #{info.toer:VARCHAR}, UPDATETIME = #{info.updatetime:VARCHAR}, TRANTIME = #{info.tranTime:VARCHAR}, TRANYEAR = #{info.tranYear:VARCHAR}, TRANMONTH = #{info.tranMonth:VARCHAR}, IDNO = #{info.idNo:VARCHAR}, IDNAME = #{info.idName:VARCHAR} WHERE ID = #{info.id}

DELETE FROM TB_ASSET_LOG WHERE ID in
#{ids}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM TB_ASSET_LOG t WHERE 1=1
and ( 2=1 or t.USERID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.USERNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.MOBILE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.TRANTYPE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.ITEMNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.FROMER LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.TOER LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.TRANYEAR LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.TRANMONTH LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.IDNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') )
order by t.UPDATETIME DESC
